Ring Color

# Ring Color

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                    | Support     |
| ------------------------ | ----------- |
| ```
ring-inherit
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-current
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-transparent
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-black
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-white
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-{n}
```         | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-[n]
```         | 🌐 Web only |
